Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.domain

Class DomainBuilder

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.domain.DomainBuilder
public class DomainBuilder extends Object
Fluent Builder API for creating a Domain object. Initial height and width does not need to be provided It will AUTODETECT this. Remember to call .make() to crystalise the object. Every domain must have - Exactly one player. - At least one exit. Example usage: DomainBuilder db = new DomainBuilder(); Domain d = db .wall(1, 2) .wall(1, 3) .wall(1, 4) .wall(2, 4) .player(0, 1) .exit(5, 5) .make() toString() --> |_|P|_|_|_|_| |_|_|#|#|#|_| |_|_|_|_|#|_| |_|_|_|_|_|_| |_|_|_|_|_|E|
Author:
Brandon Ru 300562436
